captions.text: "Worst day of my life".
Hello.
Welcome to this extra video on Tuesday.
Well, this video is not gonna be funny.
None of them is funny!.
DIE!!.
This video is gonna be a bit different.
I'm gonna tell you about,
"The worst day of my life".
Ok, not the WORST.
But it's on the Top 10.
Ok, ok, ok..
Everything started on the year 1990-I can't remember.
I was the entire day and night studying.
Given that I was a studious and responsible young man,
I had a very important test the next day so I almost didn't sleep because of the studying.
Everything's great.
But the next day is when everything started going wrong.
First of all I woke up with this face.
Kill me.
Because I slept like 2 hours because I studied so much.
Ok, everything's ok.
I got up, I went to take a shower.
And the fucking problems started.
There was no hot water.
I wasn't going to school smelling like dog puke.
So I manned up and I showered with cold water.
And it looked kinda like this.
I was freezing.
When I ended up with pneumonia level god,
I got dressed, I got ready,
and I was gonna make myself some breakfast.
Given that there was no hot water, I also didn't have gas for cooking.
So I said, "Ok, I'll leave without eating".
It was 7:50AM and school started at 8:00AM.
And it took half an hour more or less to get there.
So, in few words.
I went out as fast as I could to take the bus.
I ran.
And the bus wasn't there.
So I sat to wait for it.
Already a bit angry, I started walking while I waited.
And there was this lady who was also waiting for the bus.
And the bit.. says.
You're late.
And I very politely said
Suck a dog!!.
After 15 minutes of waiting, the bus was there.
I enter the holy bus and the driver says:
You're late.
Because apparently it was the new thing to state the obvious.
After telling him to suck a dog, I get in the bus and the bus started.
And there I was.
Suddenly a gigantic guy gets in the bus.
He was 2 meters tall,
And 1 meter wide.
And he was kinda like:
And while I was watching him walk on my direction I thought:
Please don't sit by my side, please don't sit by my side.
And guess what.
The motherfucker sits by my side!.
He has a perfect not taken sit but he sits by me.
Because he was so big,
he took his sit and half o mine.
So the rest of the trip I was stuck to the window like this:
After a beautiful 30 minute trip, I arrived to my school.
I got off the bus and entered the school.
I'm going in and the door man says:
You're late.
And I said:
Suck a dog.
I kept walking with a swollen gigantic vein because of the anger.
When I run into the principal.
She was an old lady more wrinkled than a raisin in a desert.
She looked like that old lady from "Monsters Inc".
She even told me:
German, you're late.
And well, because she was the principal,
and was very educated, I had to get to her level and I said:
Principal, lick the canine.
And the old lady told me that I couldn't get into school because it was too late.
Fucking old lady kicked me out.
And I was about to punch her with my lefty and my righty.
But I said, "ok",
"I missed the test, there's nothing I can do".
And I calmed down a little bit.
Until I remembered that the buses that went to my home didn't come until the afternoon.
And the only way to go back home that early was walking.
And it was more or less,
3 hours walking.
Son of a bitch!!.
Ok, a bit more relaxed I decided that I had to go and eat something.
Because I hadn't had any breakfast.
And there was a mall near so I went there.
Bad thing is that it was 9AM more or less.
And I was wearing my uniform.
And at 9AM all the students are at school.
And if they're not there, it's because they skipped class.
So everyone on the street looked at me like:
You ran away from school.
Hey look, he skipped class.
But anyway, I got to the mall,
I went up to the dining floor.
And I stood there like an idiot deciding what to eat.
And there I was, in the middle of everything with an idiotic face thinking:
Do I eat a pizza or a hamburger?.
After half an hour I decided,
A hamburger.
I happily went to buy it and there was an enormous line.
Gigantic.
Why is it that in these fast food places there are always huge lines.
I mean if they were actually fast there wouldn't be a line.
Finally after waiting in this gigantic line,
I got to the counter to ask for my order.
And I said, "Can I have a cheeseburger with french fries please?"
And the young man said:
After not understanding a thing he said,
and pretend that I actually did just to not look like an idiot.
I finished my order and I was going to pay.
And that's when I noticed I left my wallet at home.
I left home in such a hurry that I forgot it.
And there was this guy waiting for me to give him the money.
And I was like:
I'm looking for the money.
And then I said:
I have it somewhere over here but I can't find it.
I ran and I ran and I ran.
I ran like there was no tomorrow.
No one was chasing me
but I kept running.
I ran until I got to the bathroom and there I stayed.
I put on
a hoodie.
I got there and the man who cleans the bathrooms was there.
And he says:
You're skipping class aren't you?.
And I'm like.
And he said:
At your age I also skipped class and now, now I clean bathrooms.
Kinda freaked out I exit the bathroom.
But what that man said, got to me.
And I said, Fuck it.
If I studied all night for this test, I'm giving it.
So I got up, I went out of the mall,
I went to school, I entered the school,
I looked for the Principal and I said:
"Listen to me Miss, I spent all night studying and I deserve to take that test,"
"I might not be the best student, I might not have the best grades"
"but I'm a student in this school and I have a right,"
"and in this moment I'm asking for my most important right"
"take this test, and I swear for my life"
"that I will".
After that touching speech,
the principal kicked me out of school and gave me suspension.
She didn't kick me out but she did say No.
And that's when I used my plan B.
B.
Beg.
Let me take this test, don't be cruel please.
After crying for like half an hour, she let me in.
I did it!, I did it!.
I happily go to the classroom.
I knock on the door, the teacher opens and says:
You are late.
And myself holding onto my happiness I say:
"You don't say."
And he closes the door in my face.
Everybody go to hell.
I took my stuff and I walked home.
3 hour walking under Super Mega Super Powerful sun.
I got home very happy.
I'm finally home!, finally.
I check my backpack to find my keys to enter my house.
And they weren't there.
I forgot to take them in the morning.
Everything's fucking Nilton's fault.
And after waiting like 5 hours like an idiot.
My mom arrived and I finally could enter my house.
And my adventure finished.
Finally.
At the end, I gave the test that next week and I failed.
So the moral of this story is,
Pay your gas bills.
Always have money in your pocket.
Always take your house keys.
And the most important.
Never tell your school's principal to suck a dog.
Question!.
Has something like this ever happened to you?.
Have you ever locked yourself outside your house?.
Or arrived school so late that they won't let you in?.
Tell me in the comments.
Also I want to congratulate Ulises Garcia whose birthday was last monday.
I hope you had a great time Ulises.
Happy late birthday.
And this was the extra video, not this week's,
the extra video.
And well like I said, this video wasn't meant to make you laugh,
If it made you laugh, that's your problem.
But anyway I hope my bad luck entertained you.
Don't forget to subscribe, remember this friday I upload video,
a normal video like I always make.
I mean "NORMAL", like I was normal.
A psychological hug and see you in 2 days,
Wednesday,
Thursday, friday.
See you on Friday.
Take care, I love you.
Bye bye.

comments.text:
Este es el peor dia de mi vida: 

Era un dia que me tenia que levantar solo para ir al colegio ya que mis 
padres no estaban. Entraria a las 9:00 al colegio. Me puse la larma a las 
6:30. Esta no sono -_- entonces me levante a las 8:40. Desayune rápido, me 
lava los dientes y domo no tenia tiempo para bañarme sali de mi casa 
oliendo a poni muerto XD. El colectivo tarto en llegar. Llego a las 9:38. 
Por suerte el dolegio no estaba tan lejos y no habia tráfico hacinque 
llegie tipo 9:50. Fui a buscar a mi preceptora para dar el precente y me 
dijo: "NO YA NO SE PUEDE". Entonces sin avisarle a mi put* preceptora me 
fui al salon sin avisarle ya que no queria que mi madre pensara que me 
ratie o algo asi que tenia ausente (pero el ausente lo tenia igual ya que 
la prece no me lo puso, obviamente igual no pensaba). Entonces llege al 
salon y el profe me dijo: "Legaste tarde y anda a buscar mesas que aqui no 
hay.
Entonces saliendo del salon para ir a buscar mesas, me encuentro a la 
preceptora que me dice: "que hace aca? Le dije que no puede entrar ya!". Le 
dije que ya me iría pero seguí buscando mesas. No las encontre entonces 
volviendo al salon el profe me dice que me siente en grupo con una mesa y 
valla a buscar a otro compañero que fue a buscar silla. Saliendo del salon 
me encuentro con la preceptora y me dice: "que hace en el salon? Venga que 
lo sanciono" me lleno un acta de sancion y me tuve que volver a casa siendo 
las 10:30. Me acorde que en el horario del colectivo no pasaria hasta las 
5:40. Asi que me fui caminando muerto de frio ya que sali tan apurado que 
tenia la remera de manga forta y nada mas. Y hacia muuuuuuchoooooooo frio. 
Yo volviendo caminando a mi casa, hize 2 cuadras hasta que vi un colectivo 
¡era el que me llevaba! Entonces extrañado me subi y cuando estoy por 
pagarle me doy cuenta que me olvide la tarjeta del transporte público. 
Entonces me tuve que volver caminando XD. YA LLegando a mi casa busco las 
llaves y me doy cuenta que me las olvide. Entonces espere desde las 11:00 
hasta las 5:10 que mi madre volvio del trabajo. D:﻿

comments.text:
Bueno todo ocurrio cuando tenia 9 años, me enceñaban agudas,graves y 
esdrujulas.
Yo no entendi muy bien,la maestra nos tomaba todo los dias controlitos 
(evaluaciones para controlar si entendemos el tema).
Y lo que sucedio fue que comenzaba a desaprobarlos todo el tiempo me sacaba 
generalmente 5.
Cuando mi hermana mayo me hizo estudiar un monton hasta que aaprendi y 
taran me sacaba 10.
Una historia con final feliz
Pd: me paso igual con las diviciones.
Te amo german.
<3﻿

comments.text:
Esto les parecerá gracioso pero yo lo sufrí jajaja. Bueno un día estaba 
yendo a recoger mi celular de el técnico a las 6:30 de la mañana y el 
técnico me había dicho que solo estaba hasta las 8:30 estuve desde las 6 
hasta las 8:20 en la parada del colectivo y el cabrón no venia hasta que 
por fin vino y fui y llegue a las 8:50 ya estaban cerrando y le dije por 
favor necesito recoger mi celular y el muy cabrón me dijo cerramos espere 
que se fuera en su auto agarre una piedra no muy grande  y le rompí el 
vidrio entre y la puta alarma sonó todos los vecinos salieron y yo me 
escondí en el cuarto de atrás hasta que vi mi celular y la puta vecina 
vieja de alado llama a la policía entonces la suerte me sonrió y vi un pasa 
montañas para ponerme me lo puse y nadie vio mi cara corrí 12 cuadras y 
nadie sospechaba porque no había casi nadie a esa hora me saque el pasa 
montañas decido sacar mi celular y el puto se me cayo mientras estaba 
corriendo me volví las 12 cuadras y en la cuadra 2 encontré mi celular 
tirado y cuando recen y lo vi con la pantalla rota y no había otro lugar 
para arreglarlo que el lugar al que lo había llevado anteriormente osea el 
local al que le había roto el vidrio entonces yo digo no sabe quien soy 
porque me puse el pasamontañas pero la el puto llavero estaba en la sala 
donde estaba mi celular y el dueño me descubrió y tuve que pagar el puto 
vidrio yyyyyyyyy chau.﻿
comments.author: Predator 78

comments.text:
El peor dia de mi vida:
Tenía que ir a un campamento estaba super emocionada, tenia que estar en la 
escuela a las 6:00 y yo me desperte a las 3:43 porque no podia dormir de la 
emocion, dije "es muy temprano 5 min. Más" entoces esos 5 min. Se 
convirtieron en mas de una hora. Desperte a las 5:40 solo tenia 20 min. 
Bueno me pare como loca me bañé,vestí y arreglé después desayuné fui 
corriendo a la escuela con mi mamá y fuimos persiguiendo el buss no lo 
álcense y lo peor es que pagué con mi dinero $ el paseo y eran $200.00 
😢fue horrible ﻿

comments.text:
A mi me paso esto :
Un día lunes yo normalmente me despierto a las 6:00 y a la secu entro a las 
7:00 y bueno me vesti, desayune y me puse a mirar televisión me dormi en la 
cama mirando tele me despierto a las 7:30 y bueno sali lo más rapido 
posible y me despedi de mis padres, al tomar el autobus por suerte que 
pasaba tambien a las 7:30. Cuando llego a la escuela, cerrado... ¡ERA 
FERIADO!, con razón mis padres dijieron que no era necesario ir y como tan 
rapida que estuve para ir nisiquiera entendi :(﻿

comments.text:
Un día yo me dormí super extremadamente tarde me dormí como a las 3 de la 
mañana pensando en que CHUCKY me iba a matar,porque esa misma noche vi la 
pelicula de CHUCKY entonces ya se me iban cerrando los ojos y finalmente y 
al siguiente día  me desperté a las 5:57 y yo me iba a las 6:30 de la 
mañana,entonces desayuné lo más rapido que pude y nisiquiera terminé de 
comer entonces mi mamá me llamó para que me fuera a dejar al colegio y eran 
las 6:52 cuando nos fuimos y llegué al colegio tomé mis cosas y entré y no 
me dejaron entrar a la clase........FIN﻿
